mapper.update: update slave_relay_log_info set Number_of_lines = #{numberOfLines,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Relay_log_pos = #{relayLogPos,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Master_log_pos = #{masterLogPos,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Sql_delay = #{sqlDelay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Number_of_workers = #{numberOfWorkers,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Relay_log_name = #{relayLogName,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, Master_log_name = #{masterLogName,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where Channel_name = #{channelName,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select Channel_name, Number_of_lines, Relay_log_pos, Master_log_pos, Sql_delay, Number_of_workers, Id, Relay_log_name, Master_log_name from slave_relay_log_info where Channel_name = #{channelName,jdbcType=CHAR}
select Channel_name, Number_of_lines, Relay_log_pos, Master_log_pos, Sql_delay, Number_of_workers, Id, Relay_log_name, Master_log_name from slave_relay_log_info
